/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The buildings are adorned with numerous windows and balconies, hinting at the bustling life within. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
